messages.subject: Summer unschooling ideas
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! This summer we re taking the kids up to the mountains about once a week. We re taking the tent and lunch and day camping. We set up the tent and
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone!

This summer we're taking the kids up to the mountains about once a week.
We're taking the tent and lunch and "day camping."

We set up the tent and the baby has a safe place to roll and practice
crawling, we have naptime in there, it's way cooler than in town.

We have lunch and snacks there and when it gets dark head back to town. It's
about 20 degrees cooler up there than down here, so we really enjoy and look
forward to it.

:-) Diane
